SEARCH
Package BusinessLayer

Class employeeDAO

java.lang.Object
BusinessLayer.employeeDAO
public class employeeDAO extends Object
The employeeDAO class provides data access methods for Employee objects in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    employeeDAO()
    Constructs an EmployeeDAO object and initializes the database connection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteEmployee(int employeeId)
    Deletes an employee from the database based on the provided ID.
    List<Employee>
    getAllEmployees()
    Retrieves a list of all employees from the database.
    void
    insertEmployee(Employee emp)
    Inserts an Employee object into the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • employeeDAO

      public employeeDAO() throws SQLException
      Constructs an EmployeeDAO object and initializes the database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error establishing the database connection.

  • Method Details

    • insertEmployee

      public void insertEmployee(Employee emp)
      Inserts an Employee object into the database.
      Parameters:
      emp - The Employee object to be inserted.

    • getAllEmployees

      public List<Employee> getAllEmployees()
      Retrieves a list of all employees from the database.
      Returns:
      List of Employee objects representing all employees in the database.

    • deleteEmployee

      public void deleteEmployee(int employeeId)
      Deletes an employee from the database based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to be deleted.
